## Input.insertFieldAt() method

Inserts a field (or label from string), and all prefix and suffix fields, at the location of the input's field row.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
insertFieldAt(index: number, field: string | Field, opt_name?: string): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  index | number | The index at which to insert field. |
|  field | string \| [Field](./blockly.field.md) | Something to add as a field. |
|  opt\_name | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Language-neutral identifier which may used to find this field again. Should be unique to the host block. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

The index following the last inserted field.
